## Observation notes  
First documented by Fletcher, 1902, with extensive historical record in the Pacific Maritime. Biodiversity Galiano Life List: 2017, Galiano. Ratti et al. 2008: <span class="hl-place-name">Fraser Valley</span>. Guzman et al., 2023: 2005; 2009; 2012; 2017, <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>. NBSBC Bee Atlas Database: 2021, 2022, 2023; 2022, <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>; 2022, <span class="hl-place-name">Sunshine Coast</span>; 2022, <span class="hl-place-name">Squamish</span>. iNaturalist: widespread throughout the Pacific Maritime, from 2006.
